name: Agents and brokers
text:
(a)  Connector-certified insurance agents and brokers may enroll individuals and employers in qualified plans through the connector and assist individuals and employers in applying for applicable premium tax credits and cost-sharing reductions for which they may be eligible.
     (b)  If a health insurance plan utilizes and compensates an insurance agent or broker, the Hawaii health connector shall not be responsible for any compensation to that agent or broker that sells a qualified health plan through the connector.  The issuer of the qualified health plan shall bear all compensation to an agent or broker that sells a qualified health plan through the connector. [L 2014, c 233, pt of §2]
